overview: Wurstfilm proudly presents the first "unofficial" look at the Israeli Defense - the sucking and fucking military group that prides itself defending its homeland. Watch behind the scenes footage of the IDF Private barking orders at his subordinate warrant officers, commanding mandatory suck sessions, the gang of a hooded army corporal, and see hot Israeli assholes get drilled for the good of the Jewish state. All Special Units are ready at the Northern Command in this cum-dripping expos.
title: My Israeli Platoon
